text:
riqShaH pA#tuq nakta$M ||
jAqtO yada#gnEq Buva#nAq vyaKya#H paqSuM na gOqpA iryaqH pari#jmA |
vaiSvA#naraq brahma#NE vinda gAqtuM ~MyUqyaM pA#ta svaqstiBiqH sadA# naH ||
tvama#gnE SOqciShAq SOSu#cAnaq A rOda#sI apRuNAq jAya#mAnaH |
tvaM dEqvA(gm) aqBiSa#stEramu~jcOq vaiSvA#nara jAtavEdO mahiqtvA ||
aqsmAka#magnE maqGava#thsu dhAraqyAnA#mi kShaqtramaqjara(gm)# suqvIrya$M |
vaqyaM ja#yEma Saqtina(gm)# sahaqsriNaqM ~MvaiSvA#naraq - [  ] 48
